Title: Relates to the registration of bicycles with electric assist used for commercial purposes
Summary: Requires the registration of bicycles with electric assist used for commercial purposes; provides liability of employers for certain violations.
LawCode: Add ยง1244, amd ยง1242, V & T L; amd ยง10-157, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to registration and commercial operation of electric assist bicycles
